description.value: The warding bell's light increases from a faint flickering to luminous enough that the whole room is brightly lit. The hazard then rolls initiative.

details.description: At the heart of the shrine hangs a massive bronze temple bell.
details.disable: Ringing the bell as an Interact action eight times in succession with the ceremonial ringer (carried by Mago Kai) over the course of three consecutive rounds automatically deactivates the hazard, @Check[type:thievery|dc:36] to extinguish the flame within the bell, @Check[type:religion|dc:36] to appeal to Pharasma to extinguish the flame, or dispel magic or a shimmerthief's Drain Light (6th level; counteract DC 29)
details.reset: Reactivating the warding bell requires a complicated rite taking several days.
details.routine:
(1 action; divine, emotion, enchantment, fear, mental) The warding bell emits a harrowing ring that can be heard only by undead or transmigrated PCs in area C11; affected characters must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:30|traits:divine,emotion,enchantment,fear,mental] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to the warding bell's routine for 24 hours.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} and takes @Damage[6d6[mental]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}, takes @Damage[12d6[mental]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] as long as it remains frightened.
